headline: Assessing Berkshire Hathaway’s Valuation As Shares Trade Near US$745,000 With Modest 1 Year Return
summary: Why Berkshire Hathaway is on investors’ radar Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.A) is back in focus for investors as they reassess the conglomerate’s recent share performance and fundamentals, including its current price around $745,000 and value score of 4. With reported revenue of $372.1b and net income of $67.5b, investors are weighing how this diversified business mix, spanning insurance, rail, utilities, manufacturing, retail, and services, fits into their long term portfolio goals.
